text: Scans HTML files directory (default pkgdown/assets/examples) updates standard _pkgdown.yml new sub-menu listing html files.

Generate Examples Menu and Index for pkgdown — add_pkgdown_examples
text: examples_dir Character. Path directory containing example HTML files. Default "pkgdown/assets/examples". pkgdown_yml Character. Path _pkgdown.yml file update menu. Default "_pkgdown.yml".

title: Initialize gsm Extension package — init_gsm_package
text: strPackageDir path package directory lDescriptionFields list description fields, passed usethis::create_package(). Default list(). bIncludeWorkflowDir boolean argument declaring whether include inst/workflow directory root package. Default TRUE.
